name: Atop The Leaderboard
description:
Do you have what is takes to bounce yourself to the top of the leaderboard?

Welcome to the game where the Leaderboard is the game. Use your championship Pogo Stick skills to climb the Leaderboard entries to reach for the gold medal. Should you falter in one of the danger zones, you'll be able to leave your mark for the next contender.

Content warning: the leaderboard entries are not moderated and may contain vulgarities. Controls

You control Alfred with only your mouse. Right click to charge your pogo stick to bounce yourself off of walls and obstacles. Alfred has the strength to slide on to a wall with a single hand, so be sure to use that to your advantage on your climb.

Game jam

Made with 🤍 for the 72h ScoreSpace Jam #21. The constraint is Leaderboard integration and theme is "Bounce".

Credits

Thanks to Antti Luode for the musical piece "The Prodigal Son" 💛
